price: (Allāhu) Òun ni Ẹni tí Ó fi ìmọ̀nà àti ẹ̀sìn òdodo (’Islām) rán Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀ nítorí kí Ó lè fi borí gbogbo ẹ̀sìn (mìíràn) pátápátá, àwọn ọ̀ṣẹbọ ìbáà kórira rẹ̀.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلۡحَقِّ لِيُظۡهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī arsala rasūlahu bil-hudā wadīni al-ḥaqi liyuẓ'hirahu ʿalā al-dīni kullihi walaw kariha al-mush'rikūna
